info.name: License Management API
info.description:
Requests to LicenseSpring Mangament API

Please refer to our official documentation if anything is unclear:

[https://docs.licensespring.com/docs/management-api](https://docs.licensespring.com/docs/management-api)

Please select environment "LicenseSpring - development" and click on "eye" to view variables.  
Fill fields:

apiKey

sharedKey

managementApiKey

which are provided on your LS company under settings > keys.

also change under environment {{api_url}} to [https://saas.licensespring.com](https://saas.licensespring.com)

Start making requests.  
Requests are divided in special folders, please always run first request which is "List License,List Customers"...in order to work.

If you desire to make your own request(eg. that is not last license, customer added) please look at example under each request or refer to our documentation or change named {{variable}} under environment to desired value.

First request in folder have all data in response that can be included on other requests in that folder.

Voila, you. are good 2 go.

request.description:
### Parameters

***Bold and italic names*** are required fields.

| **Name** | **Type** | **Values (Acceptable or Default)** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ***environment*** | ***string*** | ***win, win32, win64. mac, linux, linux32. linux64*** | ***Environment where installation files are meant to be used.*** |
| hash_md5 | string | \- | MD5 hash of the installation file. If an non-md5 value is specified the request will return an error. |
| full_link | string | \- | Link to the installation file. |
| ***product*** | ***integer*** | ***\-*** | ***ID of the product meant to be used with installation file.*** |
| release_date | Date | \- | Format: yyyy-mm-dd (2020-12-21) |
| version | string | \- | Version of the installation file. |
| release_notes_link | string | \- | Link to the release notes |
| eula_link | string | \- | Link to the eula. |
| size | string |  | Digits only. |
| requires_version | string | Will be set to oldest existing version if none specified. | Version of installation file required. |

request.description:
### Parameters

*   `name`
    *   string
*   `data_type`
    *   string
    *   choices: `number`, `text`, `date/time`
*   `default_value`
    *   string
*   `description`
    *   string

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Custom Field Name",
    "data_type": "string",
    "default_value": "Default Field Value",
    "description": "Description of custom field name",
    "product": 1
}
